mapper.update:
UPDATE so_installment
installment_code = #{installmentCode},
batch_num = #{batchNum},
order_code = #{orderCode},
pay_precondition = #{payPrecondition},
pay_status = #{payStatus},
pay_price = #{payPrice},
c_id = #{cId},
c_name = #{cName},
pay_time = #{payTime},
pay_comment = #{payComment},
platform_id = #{platformId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
